description:
The combination between Dancouga Nova and R-Daigun, this is the final unit of the Dancouga Nova Project based on the Final Dancouga`s data. Due to the combination of both units, the Dancouga Max God is the strongest of all the Dragon`s Hive`s machines as well as giving it an improved flight capabilities. Its armaments are similar to Dancouga Nova but with more attacks.
Source: Wiki
name: Dancouga Max God
